features: New women-specific chamois pad long distances (6h-7h)
Comfortable leg band (2.5 inches) made of a double layer of fabric
This new chamois pad has additional high-density inserts positioned in the central zone of the pad, which offer an increased protection
Super breathable, this pad allows maximum freedom of motion and is specifically designed to provide you with lasting comfort on endurance rides that go beyond 4h
Made of a seamless elastic band, providing optimal support with minimal bulk
This bib has one back pocket so you can easily carry your things around
Developed with an athletic leg band (2.5 inches) made of a light silicone gripper fabric.
